title: kuncita pAdam
sahitya:
kuncita pAdam ninaindurugum painkoDi tanaik-kaN pArAi iravu paghal


anupallavi

  kanja malar idazhin vizhiyAL OyAk-kAdhluDan shivakAmi maNALa nin


caraNam    konjum shadangai galIr galIrena kuzhavi iLam pirai paLIr paLIrena nanjam
 tavazhum nIla kaNThamum minna oru nangai gangai shaDaiyil kulunga naTamADum
